boxes.poi.stones.examine:
THERE IS NOTHING
UNDER THESE STONES
boxes.poi.echocorpse.success:
HE WAS ONE OF OUR
BEST WARRIORS
boxes.splash.holy.1:
I'VE FOUND A PIECE
OF A STRANGE LANCE
boxes.splash.holy.2:
I NOW POSSES THE
MIGHTY HOLY LANCE
boxes.warn.spitter.damage:
IT'S PROTECTED BY
THE WALLS OF FLESH

cutscenes.intro.text.1:
WE WERE SENT BY THE
POPE INTO THE LANDS
OF LANGOBARDIA 
HORRIBILIS. OUR
MISSION WAS TO FIND
THE HOLY LANCE...
cutscenes.intro.text.2:
WE FINALLY ARRIVED
TO THE WATERS OF
TREBIA RIVER,
CLOSE TO SANCTI
COLUMBANI CHURCH...
cutscenes.intro.text.3:
HOWEVER, THE RIVER
FLOODED THE LANDS,
AND OUR GROUP WAS
CAUGHT BY THE FORCES
OF DARKNESS...
cutscenes.intro.text.4:
I AM ALONE,BUT I
WILL FIND THE
WAY TO THE CHURCH.
GOD, LOOK UPON ME.
cutscenes.endgame.text.1:
I LOOK UPON THE
GATE THAT HAS
APPEARED BEFORE ME.
A COLD AND DARK
GASH IN REALITY...
cutscenes.endgame.text.2:
SURROUNDED ONLY
BY DEAD FLESH,
I DECIDE TO MAKE A
STEP TOWARDS
THE BLACK GATE...
cutscenes.endgame.text.3:
PAIN AND BLACKNESS
ARE THE ONLY THINGS
THAT I FIND INSIDE.
THIS HUNGRY HELL IS
DEVOURING ME...
cutscenes.endgame.text.4:
WHILE MY EYES CLOSE
AND MY FLESH BURNS,
I SEE A DISTANT LIGHT.
GOD, WHY HAST THOU
FORSAKEN ME?
cutscenes.credits.text.1:

- JACOPO 'FAUST'
BUTTIGLIERI
